item.title: Fake Disneyland
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: "On a recent trip to Thailand, today's guest columnist Alain Littaye, (author, along with Didier Ghez, of the acclaimed "Disneyland Paris, From Sketch to Reality" book) got a chance to visit Bangkok's largest theme park, "Dream World." He was quite amazed to see how good ideas never die... especially Walt Disney Imagineering ideas. He shares his many observations below in his MiceAge debut." (Link courtesy of BoingBoing)
